mapper.select: select id, title,excerpt, content, categoryid, ccount, rcount, creator, lastUpdate from post where id = #{id}
select p.id, p.title, excerpt, c.name as category,ccount, p.creator, p.lastUpdate from post p left join category c on p.categoryid=c.id where p.type=#{query.type}
select p.id, title from post where type='post' order by createTime desc limit 10;
select p.id, p.title, p.excerpt from post p inner join category c on p.categoryid=c.id where c.name=#{query.categoryName} and p.type=#{query.type} order by p.createTime;
